    • Constructor Detail

      • OperatorSoftware

    • Method Detail

      • calculateOSFailed

        public void calculateOSFailed()
        Determine whether the Operator Software has failed. Calculate a random number between 0 and 100 (percent) If the random number generator is less that the failure chance constant, set the OS to failed.

      • rebootOS

        public void rebootOS()
        Repairs the Operator Software or "Reboots" it - sets OSFailed to false.

      • isOSFailed

        public boolean isOSFailed()

      • setOSFailed

        public void setOSFailed(boolean OSFailed)

      • step

        public void step(int numSteps)
        Advance the game by a number of time steps. If the game reaches a game over state before all steps are executed, the game stops stepping.
        Parameters:
        numSteps - number of timesteps to advance the game by.

      • newGame

        public void newGame(java.lang.String operatorName)
        Creates a new Game - used in UI to start a new game.
        Parameters:
        operatorName - the name of the player

      • saveGame

        public boolean saveGame()
        Saves the state of the current game (plant) into a file called "save.ser" inside the current folder.
        Returns:
        true if saving a game was successful, false otherwise.

      • loadGame

        public boolean loadGame()
        Loads the state of the current game (plant) from a file called "save.ser" inside the current folder. If the file does not exist, the load will not be successful (nothing will happen).
        Returns:
        true if loading a game was successful, false otherwise.

      • togglePaused

        public void togglePaused()
        Pauses/resumes the game on call. Currently not in used as the game is turn based. Gives the possibility to easily create a real-time game.

      • getHighScores

        public java.util.List<HighScore> getHighScores()
        Returns the highscores list.
        Returns:
        list of highscores.

      • addHighScore

        public boolean addHighScore(HighScore newHighScore)
        Adds a new score to high scores if the new score is in the top 10 of all scores.
        Returns:
        true if adding was successful and the new score is in top 10, false otherwise.

      • getOperatorName

        public java.lang.String getOperatorName()

      • getScore

        public int getScore()

      • isGameOver

        public boolean isGameOver()

      • setValve

        public boolean setValve(int valveID,
               boolean open)
        Returns true if command was successful, false if a valve with that ID was not found
        Returns:
        true if command was successful, false if a valve with that ID was not found

      • setPumpOnOff

        public boolean setPumpOnOff(int pumpID,
                   boolean on)
        Returns true if command was successful, false if a pump with that ID was not found
        Returns:
        true if command was successful, false if a pump with that ID was not found

      • setPumpRpm

        public boolean setPumpRpm(int pumpID,
                 int rpm)
                   throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Sets the RPM of a particular pump.
        Parameters:
        pumpID - the internal ID of the pump.
        rpm - the new value of the RPM, needs to be in range (0 to MAX_RPM).
        Returns:
        true if setting the RPM was successful, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if RPM is out of the allowed range (rpm < 0 || rpm > MAX_RPM).

      • setControlRods

        public void setControlRods(int percentageLowered)
        Sets a new percentage for the control rods. Setting the percentage to 100 means that the control rods are fully inside the reactor and the reaction stops. Setting the percentage to 0 means that the control rods are outside of the reactor.
        Parameters:
        percentageLowered - the new value of percentageLowered

      • setRandomComponent

        private boolean setRandomComponent()
        Sets a random component to a random value. Used when setting component values while the Operator Software is not functional.
        Returns:
        true if setting component was successful, otherwise false.

        public int getReactorHealth()

        public int getControlRodsPercentage()

      • getValvePositions

        public boolean[] getValvePositions()
        Gets the position of all of the valves within the power plant. The index of the array indicates the ID-1 of the valve.
        Returns:
        Valve positions.

      • getPumpRpms

        public int[] getPumpRpms()
        Gets the RPMs of all the pumps in the power plant. The index of the array indicates the ID-1 of the pump.
        Returns:
        Pump RPMs

      • arePumpsFunctional

        public boolean[] arePumpsFunctional()
        Gets the functionality of all the pumps in the power plant. true = operational. The index of the array indicates the ID-1 of the pump.
        Returns:
        Pump functionalities

      • arePumpsOn

        public boolean[] arePumpsOn()
        Gets whether pumps are on or off for all the pumps in the power plant. true = on. The index of the array indicates the ID-1 of the pump.
        Returns:
        Pump on/off

      • getTurbineRpm

        public int getTurbineRpm()

      • getPowerOutput

        public int getPowerOutput()

      • isTurbineFunctional

        public boolean isTurbineFunctional()

      • repairTurbine

        public boolean repairTurbine()
        Start the repair of the turbine if it has failed.
        Returns:
        true only if the turbine has failed and is not already being repaired.

      • repairPump

        public boolean repairPump(int pumpID)
        Start the repair of a particular pump.
        Parameters:
        pumpID - the internal ID of the pump to be repaired.
        Returns:
        true only if the pump is found, has failed and is not already being repaired.
